text: The meat quality is very good. I am so happy to be able to buy this quality meat in Johor. I think this place will be used in the future. The staff are very friendly, and if you buy meat, you can grill the meat on the second floor.
Happy to see decent meat shop around. They seems to have a variety of meet.. it is a Korean cuts for shabu shabu they have on display but you can ask for other cuts.  I did not take photos.
Excellent Korean butchery! Great place to get thick style pork cuts for a Korean barbecue. Also has eel, unagi, octopus, pork patties, pork bones etc.
Great butcher! Meats are of excellent quality and the butchery skills are top notch. Warm and wonderful service. Thank you!
hi if i want to buy fresh sausages and pork belly skewers from you, are you able to cook it for us?
